title: URI issue when trying to replace the ingredients photo

labels.name: bug
labels.description: Produces incorrect or unexpected result or behaviour.

labels.name: image upload
labels.description: Issues relating to image upload in products

body:
https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1689815/124385476-22ce7580-dcd6-11eb-88b8-7912d9dd1a38.mp4

Step 1: product with ingredients photo
Step 2: click on the photo
Step 3: click on new photo button
Step 4: take photo and validate
Step 5: BOOM/Crash

Sentry Issue: [OPENFOODFACTS-ANDROID-3S2](https://sentry.io/organizations/openfoodfacts/issues/2493011017/?referrer=github_integration)

```
IllegalArgumentException: Uri lacks 'file' scheme: content://org.openfoodfacts.scanner.cropper.fileprovider/my_images/Pictures/cropped4998597904397259204.jpg
    at androidx.core.net.UriKt.toFile(Uri.kt:43)
    at openfoodfacts.github.scrachx.openfood.utils.PhotoReceiverHandler.onCropResult(PhotoReceiverHandler.kt:86)

    at openfoodfacts.github.scrachx.openfood.features.ImagesManageActivity.onActivityResult(ImagesManageActivity.kt:561)
...

    at android.app.ActivityThread.deliverResults(ActivityThread.java:5265)
    at android.app.ActivityThread.handleSendResult(ActivityThread.java:5304)
    at android.app.servertransaction.ActivityResultItem.execute(ActivityResultItem.java:54)
    at android.app.servertransaction.ActivityTransactionItem.execute(ActivityTransactionItem.java:45)
    at android.app.servertransaction.TransactionExecutor.executeCallbacks(TransactionExecutor.java:135)
...
```
